columns.Competition_ID: The unique identifier for each competition.
columns.Year: The year the competition was held.
columns.Theme: The main theme of the competition in that year.
columns.Host_city_ID: The identifier for the city hosting the competition.
columns.Hosts: The names of the performers at the competition.

farm_competition.table_description: The table records details of competitions held in various years.

columns.Competition_ID: The unique identifier for each competition.
columns.Farm_ID: The unique identifier for each farm participating in the competition.
columns.Rank: The rank assigned to the farm based on competition performance.

competition_record.table_description: The table tracks competition results for participating farms.

columns.City_ID: The unique identifier for each city.
columns.Official_Name: The official name of the city.
columns.Status: The designation of the city (e.g., Village, Town).
columns.Area_km_2: The total area of the city in square kilometers.
columns.Population: The total population residing in the city.
columns.Census_Ranking: The ranking of the city based on census data.

city.table_description: The table stores demographic and geographical data for cities.

columns.Farm_ID: The unique identifier for each farm.
columns.Year: The year of data collection for the farm.
columns.Total_Horses: The total number of horses owned by the farm.
columns.Working_Horses: The number of horses used for work on the farm.
columns.Total_Cattle: The total number of cattle owned by the farm.
columns.Oxen: The number of oxen owned by the farm.
columns.Bulls: The total number of bulls owned by the farm.
columns.Cows: The total number of cows owned by the farm.
columns.Pigs: The total number of pigs owned by the farm.
columns.Sheep_and_Goats: The total number of sheep and goats owned by the farm.

farm.table_description: The table provides livestock data for various farms over different years.
